info.title: C Perks Coupon Engine
info.description: This URL would be called whenever Coupons related APIs are called on Front End like Get All coupons Tag Coupon Validate Coupons Assign Coupons COnfirm Coupon and Unblock Coupons

post.description: By calling this API, the system would return all the coupons which are applicable for a particular user. If no IM number is passed, it would return all the Generic coupons which are not tagged to any IM number
This API is used to validate the coupon applied by the user. Coupon is validated if the user satisfies certain conditions.

rewards.description: INR 500 off  with minimum booking amount of INR 2000
rewards.marketing_text: flat INR 500 off with min. booing amount of INR 2000

post.description: This API is called when user applies the coupon on the front end. Once applied, the status of the coupon shall change to assign on the admin panel

get.description: Confirm coupon API is called when user consumes the coupon on front end application. Once confirmed, coupon cannot be unblocked

parameters.name: coupon_code_id
parameters.description: coupon code id of the coupon

get.description: unblock coupon unblocks an assigned coupon after 30 minutes of no confirmation. once unblocked, coupon code can be used again

parameters.name: coupon_code_id
parameters.description: Unique Coupon code id of the coupon

post.description: this API will give all the coupons which are applicable to the user. IM number would need to be passed for getting all the applicable coupons to the user
this API will give all the coupons which are applicable to the user. IM number would need to be passed for getting all the applicable coupons to the user
Tier benefit tag API is specifically used for Tier benefit coupons which are tagged to IM users via a tag API.

This API is used to  block the coupon code whenever the user navigates to the payment gateways page. The coupon code gets blocked for 30 min. If not confirmed, the coupon is unblocked by the unblock coupon API
This API would be used to mark the coupons as confirmed after the successful transaction on the calling application.
This API would be used to tag a coupon to an IM number across all LOB as well as Partner Specific Coupons (External coupons).

get.description: Get all the coupons belonging to a specific partner code or consolidated every coupons for the customer

message.name: message
message.desc: The response message of the API with respect to the status of the API

code.name: code
code.desc: Response code from Bespoke rules engine

status.name: status
status.desc: API response status either true or false

values.desc: Result / Response of the API response / values which will be returned as an array of object
values.name: values

coupon_id.name: coupon_id
coupon_id.desc: Internal unique coupon id generated by system

campaign_id.name: campaign_id
campaign_id.desc: Unique campaign ID with respect to partner selected

description.name: description
description.desc: Description taken in form field while enrolment of coupon codes in Bespoke

terms_and_conditions.name: terms_and_conditions
terms_and_conditions.desc: Terms & conditions taken in form field while enrolment of coupon codes in Bespoke

coupon_code.name: coupon_code
coupon_code.desc: Coupon code to be used by front end user

coupon_code_id.name: coupon_code_id
coupon_code_id.desc: Internal unique id generated for the coupon code

valid_till.name: valid_till
valid_till.desc: Valid till date for the campaign

post.description: This API would be used to validate a coupon code which is applied on the front end. To validate a coupon, the user must meet the defined business conditions.

success_message.name: success_message
success_message.description: Message for successful validation of the coupons

description.name: description
description.description: Description defined for the coupon rule in C Perks

activity_code.name: activity_code
activity_code.description: Activity code defined in rule in C Perks

label.name: label
label.description: Label, if defined, im C Perks in rule in C Perks

url.name: url
url.description: URL, if defined, in C Perks

config_id.name: config_id
config_id.description: Config_id of coupons in case of co brand coupon codes

reward_type.name: reward_type
reward_type.description: Reward type as defined wheteher cash discount or miles bonus

rule_id.name: rule_id
rule_id.description: Rule id from which coupon is validated

coupon_name.name: coupon_name
coupon_name.description: Name of the coupon as defined in C Perks

marketing_text.name: marketing_text
marketing_text.description: Marketing text as defined in C Perks

coupon_code_id.name: coupon_code_id
coupon_code_id.description: Unique Coupon Code id of each coupon

coupon_code.name: coupon_code
coupon_code.description: Coupon Code applied by the user

coupon_type.name: coupon_type
coupon_type.description: Coupon type as defined in C Perks

strike_value.name: strike_value
strike_value.description: Strike value of miles whenever applicable

offer_value.name: offer_value
offer_value.description: Offer value of miles whenever applicable

discount.name: discount
discount.description: Cash discount value as defined in C Perks

lob.name: lob
lob.description: LOB as passed in the request

values.description: Get 2x of base as bonus miles on flights
values.marketing_text: Get 2x of base as bonus miles on flights

post.description: This api allows to assign the coupon code to a particular im_number (optional) currently the time limit for confirm after assigning is kept at 30 mins
Coupon Tag API Coupon Tag API Coupon Tag APICoupon Tag APICoupon Tag APICoupon Tag APICoupon Tag APICoupon Tag APICoupon Tag APICoupon Tag API
Unblock Coupon APIUnblock Coupon APIUnblock Coupon APIUnblock Coupon APIUnblock Coupon APIUnblock Coupon APIUnblock Coupon APIUnblock Coupon APIUnblock Coupon API
This API would be called when some winners of a particular campaign. New winners would replace the disqualified winners.
This API would be called when a customer purchases a ticket for a raffle campaign from the front end.

get.description: This API returns the campaigns of raffle events. The request can be for all campaigns or active campaigns.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: type can be all or active

values.name: IM Raffle Amazon Pay Bal worth INR 50000

get.description: This API would be called to check the list of campaigns in which a customer has participated. The raffle codes would also be returned in the response.

parameters.name: im_number
parameters.description: IM number of the user for which list of raffle campaigns need to fetched

get.description: This API would be called to get the list of winners for a parituclar campaign. To get the list of winners, raffle status must be Winners Declared.

parameters.name: campaign_code
parameters.description: Campaign code of the campaign for which winners need to be fetched.

get.description: This API would return the status of the raffle campaign. Status can be active, inactive, winner pending or winner declared.

parameters.name: campaign_code
parameters.description: campaign code of the campaign for which status need to be fetched

values.name: Iphone 5 campaign
values.marketing_text: Redeem miles and participate to win an iphone
values.terms_and_conditions:
Get a chance to win Iphone 5. T&C: 

  1. User shall be a registered IM number.
  2. User shall not have won any of Raffles event in past one year

post.description: This API would be called when winners of a campaign are to be picked by API. Winners can be picked only when pick winner by API checkbox is enabled.
This API would be used when a coupon is to be unblocked in case a transaction fails or due to any technical failure before the consumption of a coupon.
